summary: This appears to be an email exchange from July 27, 2019, between individuals at the Federal Bureau of Prisons discussing a news article about Jeffrey Epstein's life behind bars at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The document is marked confidential and references the Southern District of New York case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the news article being discussed about his life behind bars at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: News article about Epstein's incarceration
events.description: A news article was published about Jeffrey Epstein's life behind bars at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, NY, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email exchange dated July 27, 2019, discussing a news article about Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration.
The correspondence involves personnel from the Federal Bureau of Prisons at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The document is marked as confidential and is part of the Southern District of New York case materials.
The news article referenced was published on July 26, 2019, by nvdailynews.com.
The email includes a Latin phrase 'Si vis pacem, para bellum' (If you want peace, prepare for war).
